basics.name: Tanner Galambas
basics.label: Junior Developer
basics.summary: Frontend Developer with experience optimizing web platforms for performance, accessibility, and user engagement. Skilled in WordPress, React, and modern front-end practices. Adept at SEO, analytics, and collaborating across teams to deliver conversion-optimized solutions.

highlights: Developed and edited websites using WordPress, Elementor, and Avada page builders, enhancing user engagement and client satisfaction.
Collaborated with designers and project managers to deliver conversion-optimized experiences on time.
Conducted QA testing and optimized websites for performance and accessibility.
Implemented SEO-friendly structures and tracked performance via GA4 and analytics tools.
Integrated and customized WooCommerce features, improving eCommerce usability and sales.

highlights: Increased organic web traffic by 30% through SEO enhancements and content optimization.
Led A/B and multivariate testing to refine website usability and engagement.
Published press releases, policy updates, and official announcements with clear governance.
Built performance dashboards with GA4 and Siteimprove for leadership reporting.
Maintained CMS platforms (Strapi, Ektron) and ensured accessibility compliance.
Directed content strategy and digital storefront operations for engagement and sales growth.
Boosted sales conversions with promotions and discount campaigns.
Resolved CMS technical issues and maintained Squarespace sites.
